author: tsheen
title: West Ham transfer news: Roma coach Luciano Spalletti interested in bringing Sofiane Feghouli to Italian captial

organizations.name: manchester united by tom sheen comments roma

text:
Sofi's Choice West Ham transfer news: Roma coach Luciano Spalletti interested in bringing Sofiane Feghouli to Italian captial 
Algerian winger has only started one Premier League game this season - when he was controversially sent off against Manchester United By TOM SHEEN Comments ROMA coach Luciano Spalletti has confirmed he is interested in West Ham winger Sofiane Feghouli. 
The Algerian has started only one Premier League game this season – when he was controversially sent off against Manchester United. AP:Associated Press Roma coach Luciano Spalletti has confirmed he is interested in West Ham winger Sofiane Feghouli AP:Associated Press 3 Roma are second in Serie A and challenging Juventus for the title 
Feghouli, 27, arrived from Valencia on a free transfer in the summer but has struggled to make his way into Slaven Bilic ‘s – who has two games to save his job – plans. 
He has started only five of West Ham ‘s 28 matches, coming off the bench in another nine. 
The Algerian international is yet to score and has just one assist. 
But Spalletti – who has Roma second in Serie A and challenging for the title – has confirmed he is looking at the winger as Mohamed Salah is off the the Africa Cup of Nations. Getty Images 3 Feghouli has only started one Premier League game this season – when he was controversially sent off against Man United 
He told Italian media: “As far as I’m concerned, I don’t think this team need new players. 
“That’s the squad I chose last summer and I’m happy with these players. 
“I haven’t asked new signings. 
“Saying that, Salah will be playing the Africa Cup of nations and we nay need a replacement.” RELATED STORIES There's a secret version of Google search which can yield some very surprising results GALLANT PILGRIMS 'It was one of the best defensive displays seen at Anfield', says Plymouth boss Derek Adams 'THIS IS WHAT ECSTASY DOES' Devastated mum posts harrowing pictures of teenage daughter in a coma after taking party drug Fourth round draw When is FA Cup fourth round draw, and when are the matches due to be played? come fly with me If you're terrified of flying, these are the safest airlines in the world Fourth round draw FA Cup fourth round draw ball numbers revealed with holders Manchester United number three, Manchester City number eight and lowly Lincoln City ball number one JASMINE HAS COMPETITION Coleen Nolan gives Calum Best a sexy lap dance as she twerks on him on CBB NOT A CLUE Labour’s deputy leader admits even he doesn’t know what the party’s policy on immigration is 
He added: “[Sporting director Frederic] Massara is working hard but we also need to consider the economic aspect of every operation. 
“You already know the players that we are interested in. Feghouli is one of them. 
“We also liked [Tomas] Rincon and [Leonardo] Pavoletti, but we remain a very strong team.” West Ham player Sofiane Feghoulo receives harsh red card from referee Mike Dean
